questDescription->You've detected an orbiting spacedrone that may contain information about [relic_name]. You have the code that will force it to land at [map_definite].

To get the information, hack into the drone's computer. Hacking takes time, but those strong in intellectual skill can speed up the process.[raidsDescription]

After landing, the spacedrone will self-destruct in [destroyDelayTicks_duration].

raidsDescription(allowViolence==true)->\n\n[enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] from [enemyFaction_name] will [droneDetectionMethod]. As long as it's present, they'll send attackers approximately every [raidIntervalAvg_duration] to destroy it and steal the wealth they think it contains. You will have some time to prepare defenses around it before they arrive.
